effects.description: List of all effects to play during susceptibility

min_threshold.description: Minimum value to start rolling for application.

max_threshold.description: Value at which probabilty of getting effect applied is 1.

audio_event_start.description: [string]Audio event to play when we get this effect appleid. This overrides the default, if empty, we use the default for this type.

audio_event_stop.description: [string]Audio event to play when this effect stops being applied. This overrides the default, if empty, we use the default for this type.

animation_event_start.description: [string]Animation event to play when this effect stops being applied. This overrides the default, if empty, we use the default for this type.

animation_event_stop.description: [string]Animation event to play when this effect stops being applied. This overrides the default, if empty, we use the default for this type. Only plays if there's a start event!

damage_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the damage caused by this status effect (If it has any)
